node.title: Christ on the Shop Floor
node.description: Sam Walters will be unpacking what it means to live life evangelistically. Many times people live lives that are segregated into different sectors, where their spirituality does not necessarily permeate the rest of their lives. Discover how your relationship with God can become visible, audible and tangible to those around you, whether at your workplace, university, with family or whatever setting you find yourself in.
